headline: Cruz targets Rubio ahead of Iowa caucuses
content: By Paige Hymson, CNNUpdated 1416 GMT (2216 HKT) January 31, 2016 Washington (CNN)Ted Cruz is trying to tamp down expectations in the final hours before Iowans cast the first ballots of the 2016 primary season as a new poll shows him trailing GOP front-runner Donald Trump in the Hawkeye State.
